titles.title: We Bring A Sacrifice Of Praise

properties.copyright: 1984 John T. Benson Publishing Company, Administered by Brentwood-Benson Music Publishing, Inc.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
D
We bring a sacrifice of praise
Into the house of the Lord.
We bring a sacrifice of praise
Into the house of the Lord.

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
And we offer up to You
The sacrifices of thanksgiving.
And we offer up to You
The sacrifices of joy.
